title: Ticket #56: %B broken in git trace
description: In the git trace header, %B is supposed to expand to the root of gittrac, currently http://pinquino.cs.wisc.edup:9090. But it doesn't. It expands to the dirname of the current page. The result of this is, if you are in the wiki, the links in the header go to the wrong place.
remarks:
2009-Feb-02 11:21:48 by gthain:
Nevermind, the problem was I somehow got an extra /wiki/ into the url, which works in some cases but not all.
creator: gthain
